dialogue: The key to good time management is touching each piece of paper once.
If I can only touch it once, I'd better do it right.
I'll need to make sure I don't get interrupted after the first touch.
Turn off my phone, close my door, and ignore email.
Ugh. This will take an hour and I only have ten minutes.
Make a copy, throw away the original, and don't let me touch the copy until I have an hour in my schedule.
I wonder if I'm allowed to use salad tongs.
